text:
Deepgram (YC W16) is hiring for frontend. DG trains and deploys deep neural speech networks to enterprise and public APIs with state-of-the-art spoken language analysis. We care a lot about building products that are fast, accurate, cutting edge, and easy to use. Frontend builders are who we need. You'll work closely with our product team. Definitely apply if you want to build something customers love.

Deepgram | Senior Front End Engineer | San Francisco, CA | ONSITE, https://careers.deepgram.com

Check out these links to learn more about Deepgram. Deepgram: https://www.deepgram.com Deepgram Blog: http://blog.deepgram.com Deepgram Careers: https://careers.deepgram.com TechCrunch: https://techcrunch.com/tag/deepgram/
